name: CharlottesvilleGuide
0:
”Alexa, ask Charlottesville Guide for top five things to do”
”Tell me more about Charlottesville”
”Tell me the local news”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: charlottesville guide
des: This skill can be used to provide information about the city of Charlottesville, Virginia. In addition to an overview of the city, the skill also provides a list of attractions and sites to see in and around the city and provides news via the New York Times
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
